title: Compact, robust, and regulated-output hybrid generators for magnetic energy harvesting and self-powered sensing applications in power transmission lines
content:
Energy Environ. Sci., 2024, 17,2787-2799
DOI: 10.1039/D3EE04563C, Paper
Qingtong Li, Lei Zhang, Chi Zhang, Yu Tian, Yanyun Fan, Bo Li, Zhengang An, Dachao Li, Zhong Lin Wang
A hybrid magnetic energy harvester is demonstrated for self-powered sensors in transmission lines, showcasing unprecedented power density, compact size, lightweight, waterproofing, resilience to current fluctuations, and environmental robustness.
